Hi there, it’s been 20 years… izerop was first launched in 2003, with the help of my friends before my 18th birthday. The project, at the time, lasted about a year before it came to an end. The saga didn’t truly end, the idea has stuck with me over these years. It’s become more than just a forgotten project.

Today, I am announcing a beta launch of the project to a wider audience. Feel free to join and help me solidify this product.

See it live https://izerop.com

Thank you!
